meanings.definition: A building divided into three separate residences.
meanings.sent1: The new triplexes on Maple Street are painted in different colors.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent showed us several triplexes in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The triplexes looked like three little houses stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent4: Living in the triplexes felt like having two neighbors always nearby.
meanings.sent5: The triplexes stood out with their unique architectural design.

meanings.definition: A set of three similar things grouped together.
meanings.sent1: She bought a set of triplexes to organize her earrings, rings, and bracelets.
meanings.sent2: The triplexes of candles on the table created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The triplexes of flowers in the vase added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The triplexes of books on the shelf made it easy to find her favorite titles.
meanings.sent5: His collection of triplexes showcased his love for symmetry.
